SELECT SSI.SRC_UID /* 출처채번 */ , SSI.SRC_UNO /* 출처고유번호 */ , SSI.SRC_NM /* 출처명 */ , SSI.DMSTC_YN /* 국내여부 */ , CASE SSI.DMSTC_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN N'국내' WHEN 'N' THEN N'해외' END AS DMSTC_YN_NM /* 국내여부명 */ , SSI.FST_INS_DT /* 최초등록일 */ , SSI.FST_INS_ID /* 최초등록아이디 */ , SSI.LST_UPD_DT /* 최종수정일 */ , SSI.LST_UPD_ID /* 최종수정아이디 */ , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ESG_DB.ST_CONT_INFO SCI WHERE SCI.SRC_UID= SSI.SRC_UID) AS CONT_TOT_CNT /* 콘텐츠전체건수 */ , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ESG_DB.ST_CONT_INFO SCI WHERE SCI.SRC_UID= SSI.SRC_UID AND SCI.CONT_KIND_CD='10') AS CONT_DOC_CNT /* 콘텐츠문서건수 */ , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ESG_DB.ST_CONT_INFO SCI WHERE SCI.SRC_UID= SSI.SRC_UID AND SCI.CONT_KIND_CD='20') AS CONT_MOV_CNT /* 콘텐츠영상건수 */ FROM ESG_DB.ST_SRC_INFO SSI /* 출처정보 */
AND DATEADD(HOUR, 9, SSI.FST_INS_DT) >= #{schStrtDate}
AND DATEADD(HOUR, 9, SSI.FST_INS_DT) <= #{schEndDate}
AND DATEADD(HOUR, 9, SSI.LST_UPD_DT) >= #{schStrtDate}
AND DATEADD(HOUR, 9, SSI.LST_UPD_DT) <= #{schEndDate} /* 탈퇴승인일: 조회종료일 */
AND SSI.FST_INS_ID IN ( SELECT MBR_ID FROM ESG_DB.MB_MBR_INFO WHERE MBR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schOprtWrd}, '%') )
AND SSI.LST_UPD_ID IN ( SELECT MBR_ID FROM ESG_DB.MB_MBR_INFO WHERE MBR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schOprtWrd}, '%') )
AND SSI.SRC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schSrcWrd}, '%')
AND SSI.SRC_UNO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schSrcWrd}, '%')
AND SSI.DMSTC_YN = #{schDmstcChk} /* 국내여부 */
ORDER BY SSI.SRC_UID DESC

SELECT SSI.SRC_UID /* 출처채번 */ , SSI.SRC_UNO /* 출처고유번호 */ , SSI.SRC_NM /* 출처명 */ , SSI.DMSTC_YN /* 국내여부 */ , CASE SSI.DMSTC_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN N'국내' WHEN 'N' THEN N'해외' END AS DMSTC_YN_NM /* 국내여부명 */ , SSI.FST_INS_DT /* 최초등록일 */ , SSI.FST_INS_ID /* 최초등록아이디 */ , SSI.LST_UPD_DT /* 최종수정일 */ , SSI.LST_UPD_ID /* 최종수정아이디 */ , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ESG_DB.ST_CONT_INFO SCI WHERE SCI.SRC_UID= SSI.SRC_UID) AS CONT_TOT_CNT /* 콘텐츠전체건수 */ , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ESG_DB.ST_CONT_INFO SCI WHERE SCI.SRC_UID= SSI.SRC_UID AND SCI.CONT_KIND_CD='10') AS CONT_DOC_CNT /* 콘텐츠문서건수 */ , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ESG_DB.ST_CONT_INFO SCI WHERE SCI.SRC_UID= SSI.SRC_UID AND SCI.CONT_KIND_CD='20') AS CONT_MOV_CNT /* 콘텐츠영상건수 */ FROM ESG_DB.ST_SRC_INFO SSI /* 출처정보 */ WHERE SSI.SRC_UID = #{srcUid} /* 출처채번 */

UPDATE ESG_DB.sequences SET currval = sequences.CURRVAL + 1 OUTPUT inserted.currval WHERE NAME = 'ST_SRC_INFO_SQ01'
INSERT INTO ESG_DB.ST_SRC_INFO ( SRC_UID /* 출처채번 */ , SRC_UNO /* 출처고유번호 */ , SRC_NM /* 출처명 */ , DMSTC_YN /* 국내여부 */ , FST_INS_DT /* 최초등록일 */ , FST_INS_ID /* 최초등록아이디 */ , LST_UPD_DT /* 최종수정일 */ , LST_UPD_ID /* 최종수정아이디 */ ) VALUES ( #{srcUid} , (CASE WHEN #{dmstcYn} = 'Y' THEN ESG_DB.fnGetSrcUno('SK') ELSE ESG_DB.fnGetSrcUno('SF') END) , #{srcNm} , #{dmstcYn} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* 최초등록일 */ , #{fstInsId} /* 최초등록아이디 */ , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* 최종수정일 */ , #{lstUpdId} /* 최종수정아이디 */ )
mapper.update: UPDATE ESG_DB.ST_SRC_INFO SET SRC_NM = #{srcNm} , LST_UPD_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* 최종수정일 */ , LST_UPD_ID = 'ADMIN' /* 최종수정아이디 lstUpdId */ WHERE SRC_UID = #{srcUid}
